briefTitle: Breast Lesions Characterization on Contrast Enhanced Ultrasound With Histopathological Correlation
officialTitle: Breast Lesions Characterization on Contrast Enhanced Ultrasound With Histopathological Correlation
conditions: Malignant Neoplasm, Overlapping Lesion of Breast
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female with a diagnosed breast focal lesion

Exclusion Criteria:

* Allergic conditions to contrast media,
* asthma,
* R-L shunt
